text: Byron Allen (born Byron Allen Folks on April 22, 1961) is an American businessman, film and television producer, and comedian. He founded the U.S. media company Entertainment Studios, which has interests in television production, broadcasting, film production, and digital media. He was born in Detroit, growing up there until 1968 when he moved with his mother after her divorce to Los Angeles. title: Byron Allen
